website_summaries.verdict: With salicylic acid as the active ingredient, this is a fine choice for acne sufferers.
pros: Those with oily skin point out noticeable improvements after several washes
Safe enough for daily use, depending on your skin type
Buyers say the crisp, clean citrus scent is quite refreshing
cons: The formula is drying, so a post-shower moisturizer is critical

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER THIS. You get one instead of 3. And the microbeads end up in the ocean and never break down! Save yourself $$$ and save the planet by NOT BUYING THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Really didn't notice anything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes that it would clear up my acne on my face and body, but it didn't seem to do anything. I have pretty severe acne so I'm sure it's better for more mild acne, just not for me!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Microbeads
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find this is full of plastic polluting microbeads. I will be throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Smyrnish

customer_reviews.title: Its cheap, smells nice and ACTUALLY works.
customer_reviews.text: Hi real person here. This product smells nice and fixed my acne in a week. The issue about the environment and the beads other reviewers are talking about is valid, but if you need a quick cheap fix to your acne this is what you want to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and Skin improved
customer_reviews.text: May need a few washes and your body to respond to the salicylic acid. Purchased for light upper back acne and really kept breakouts at bay (mainly from summer heat, dirty hair, or after workouts). Saw an improvement and didn't need to repurchase after the 3 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: NickV_and_JessV

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T EFFECTIVELY TREAT KERATOSIS PILARIS
customer_reviews.text: I used this in yet another futile attempt to deal with keratosis pilaris (arm bumps). I put up with the sweet, pungent odor, applying it at least once daily until I finished the bottle. No change whatsoever. If, like me, you're considering this as treatment for keratosis pilaris, take warning. Obviously, I'm just one person, and who knows -- for you it could be the jackpot. But it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Thurston Luckyard

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I thought I was getting. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I thought I was getting. The container is very small. My fault for not checking size. Soap itself was not what I hoped for either.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena - The savior of Acne suffers everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have used Neutrogena since I was 13 and now that I am 32 I STILL USE IT! It helps control the acne I still get as a fully grown man and I don't mean facial acne, I mean BACK-NE, the nonsense that, lets be frank, no-one wants to deal with. It is gross, hurts your skin and is embarrassing to boot. Pair this stuff with a good stiff brushed back scrubber and you're in business.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wiffen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this wash had microbeads in it. Would have preferred a clean, texture-free body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was experiencing back breakouts and needed something with cleaning strength to cut through whatever was blocking my pores. This works incredibly well. I can actually feel the difference in my skin. I only use it on my back. It smells wonderful. Lathers well.
customer_reviews.author: L S

customer_reviews.title: Great value buying in bulk on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve already been using this product for years because it has helped tremendously with the acne on my chest. However, it lasts me about two months for a single bottle so I feel like I am always buying them. With COVID-19, I haven’t wanted to leave to go buy it at the store so I decided to purchase this online. I found it in a 3 pack here on amazon at a greater deal than buying single ones at a CVS or Walgreens, etc... great deal, I can’t believe I didn’t think to buy this on here before.
customer_reviews.author: Branda

customer_reviews.title: My new go to!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this along with a body scrubber to help with my keratosis pilaris and it seems to be helping. I feel like it is a fresh clean scent and seems to last a while too. I will be re-purchasing when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: crimegirl

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: DECEIVING AND MISLEADING - only got 1 out of 3 bottles
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE - it clearly says that you will be receiving a 3 pack of these bottles but you only get one. Very deceiving and misleading. I will not be repurchasing nor will I be recommending to friends and family. If the seller decides to send us the other two bottles or refunds us for the full purchase, that would be appreciated but until then, steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mujib

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a couple weeks now and have seen huge positive changes in my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Keeps body acne at bay
customer_reviews.text: I workout 5 mornings a week. The Neutrogena body clear wash keeps any body acne away. I’m prone to shoulder and under sports bra break outs (yes, even at 40!!). I started using this body was after workouts on my back, chest, and legs for a year. I haven’t had a single break out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and helps with Back breakouts like no other. I use a scrub brush on my shoulders and back and never break out
customer_reviews.author: katin rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for wedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought for preparation for my wedding day to get rid of some acne that was living on my body. I think it really worked. I was worried that it would just take care of acne and not clean the body that great. But it does do both.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Stage

customer_reviews.title: Smells really good
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order and must not have read the product info very well because I had no idea I was getting 3 bottles so that was a pleasant surprise for the price! It also smells really good! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Creacrea

customer_reviews.title: Good Body Wash for Acne
customer_reviews.text: The product is working good. It had gotten rid of most of my acne on my back. A few spots are taken longer but I will see how it goes as I continue to use it. I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful now
customer_reviews.text: I tried this kind for my skin before. I remember it having more scrub but that's ok. If you have troubled skin issues like breakouts bumps or whatnot this kind is awesome. It helps keep it down. I'm hopeful it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work (for me)
customer_reviews.text: I saw a couple reviews on YouTube ab this product so I bought it, but I don’t really recommend it. Instead of helping me with my body acne, my back and chest felt oily and not good at all. I really works for some people but that’s not the case for me. Sorry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: It smells good but does`t work on my acne. I bought this to deal with the acne on my back, and I have already used this body wash for 1 month, but the acne still bother me badly.
customer_reviews.author: owen

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Good body wash but it didn’t work for me and I actually think it made my body acne worse but this is probably due to the fact I didn’t moisturize afterwards but I rate it a 4 stars because I’ve heard great things about it
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that is a little acne prone on my back. I can also get small bumps on the back of my arms and legs and this stuff really works to reduce those. I love the smell and how it lathers. This is the only body wash I will use! I also use it to shave my legs and it works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other stuff I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Body acne that I've had since I was a teenager (I'm 44 now) is clearing. It's not perfect but I imagine with continued use it will continue to improve. Scent isn't too strong so it's good for guys too.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product before it has helped me with back acne and I like the smell so I can honestly say it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra L.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This clears the “chicken skin” I get on my arms! I use just a little on my arms every day and my skin stays clear now! It smells nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I def recommend this to anyone it actually works within 2 days r so
customer_reviews.text: Was never a fan of grapefruit cent but this one smells really good and I like the little things it got inside lol very good have used it eveyday for the last 3 days and my chest and back e getting smoother(I have alot of tiny pimples 😅)
customer_reviews.author: Junior Medina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy , Good value, product works.
customer_reviews.text: Good smell, works well to prevent and heal body acne. Only thing is it can be drying to the skin so make sure to moisturize. Otherwise, I love it and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: AniAaron2321

customer_reviews.title: Can cause rashes and trigger asthmatics
customer_reviews.text: It gave my girlfriend and I body rashes and the smell triggered her asthma. I liked the product but I think it has irritants. I don't even have sensitive skin, but my girlfriend does, so I rarely break out but this caused a slight rash over my whole body.
customer_reviews.author: D.R_BeanieBoi23

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent, Clean Feeling
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this for long enough yet to comment on how it treats body acne, but the scent of this product is nice and leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Pack of 3 doesn’t mean 3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the pack of 3 option but only got 1 bottle i thought it was a good deal but here i am losing money. Either way i got what i wanted just not as much as i wanted so I’ll give 2 stars instead of 1
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and works great !
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’ve struggled with acne on my chest and upper back for awhile. I’m on a combination of antibiotics and topical medicine for it plus using this wash has really cleared up my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tristin Fraga

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. I pair this with the body acne spray by Paula’s Choice and if you struggle with body acne, say no more. Those two are MAGICAL together.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Gollop

customer_reviews.title: If you care about the environment, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: There are beads in this body wash that is really bad for the environment. These microbeads should be banned as they make their way into our food chain (through fish)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping my teenage son's body acne pretty well. Hasn't "cured" it but it is definitely less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: April H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is ok but it has those weird exfoliating beads and they don't break down at all.
customer_reviews.author: shyshy

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, bad acne control
customer_reviews.text: Great smell horrible for my body breakouts. Seemed to cause more intense acne all over rather than clear it up.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from me
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using this because it helps with my back acne and it smells great too
customer_reviews.author: BigBrainReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice and it seems like it works but I’ve been using it for quite some time now and it doesn’t seem to be working..
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Ordered pack of 3 but received only one.
customer_reviews.text: As this product isn't available in my region I order through Amazon and prefer to go with the 3 pack because of the overall convenience so to find out I received only one was a big disappointment. Will not be purchasing from this seller again. The product is of course good, has a nice smell to it easy to wash off and does seem to control my acne a bit. Neutrogena products usually don't disappoint in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amal Arulendran

customer_reviews.title: Love amazon value packs
customer_reviews.text: I like the value pack. I didn’t like the fact the bottles are a little smaller than original bottle sold in Target.
customer_reviews.author: Michii

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, my girlfriend was looking for this product all over and wasn't able to find it. It's exactly what she wanted... Amazing the the rescue :)
customer_reviews.author: Justin Time

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I was supposed to get 3 bottles. well when I got the package I only received one
customer_reviews.author: Nina Undefined

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy single bottle at Target, this 3-pack really has great value. Like the grapefruit smell so much! Don't work on acne treatment for me, since I used for several months but still have breakouts... But after all I only use it as a regular body wash, which is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Only one my daughter will use
customer_reviews.text: This is the only body wash my daughter will use. She love it!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shipping practices
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, but the way that the product is shipped is terrible! I received my body wash but it had leaked all over the bag. Therefore, 1 bottle wasn't totally full. The bottles should be sealed better for shipping! Maybe try placing tape on them so they don't open!
customer_reviews.author: LoveMySassyNails

customer_reviews.title: Missing bottle
customer_reviews.text: Product said you would get multiple bottles, I was only sent one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but I only got 1 and paid for a 3 pack
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but I only got 1 and paid for a 3 pack
customer_reviews.author: Barnabas

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I have it 3 stars because it smells really good but that about it. I don’t see a difference when it comes to fighting acne.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brazzale

customer_reviews.title: Better than everything else I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about a month. I feel the product cleared up my acne on my back and the flare ups diminished. I use it daily. It has worked the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie Banning

customer_reviews.title: Depends on skin.
customer_reviews.text: My skin didn’t love this and never really got rid of any acne.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Offenberger

customer_reviews.title: Better than prescriptions
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that keeps bacne at bay, better than prescriptions that I’ve used. Be sure to moisture after, it will dry you out, that’s the nature of salicylic acid.
customer_reviews.author: UZBL Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and leaves skin feeling clean and healthy. Great scent too!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline.C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for body acne
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that has helped me with body acne, it has cleared 90% of it but you need to be consistent, I use it twice a day and it really does work.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: One bottle only not 3 false ad
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy you will only get one ! Bottle !!!! Not 3
customer_reviews.author: Nondairybubonic

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I used the whole bottle and it didn't do a thing. Worthless...
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Is it just me, or does this smell like cat pee?
customer_reviews.text: IDK if I care for the scent. For some reason I can't explain, it smells more like cat pee than a grapefruit. No one wants to smell like that.
customer_reviews.author: Delora

customer_reviews.title: Only received one bottle out of the advertised three bottles I should have gotten.
customer_reviews.text: I got the package but there was only one bottle of body was inside when the title of the procuct stated that is will come in a pack of three. The product itself works ok and if I actually can get my other two bottles then I am willing to revise my review.
customer_reviews.author: Steven red

customer_reviews.title: G R A P E F R U I T
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep me clear of major breakouts, not overly drying for my skin type. Works well and simply. If you don’t like pink grapefruit scented soap, you can get the heck outta here with that nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Torres

customer_reviews.title: Get clean and smell great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Grapefruit smell in the morning shower is nice way to wake up.
customer_reviews.author: vcm773

customer_reviews.title: Such a great price for a bundle!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price for a bundle! Going to be buying this pack from now on instead of one by one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fewer bottles than advertised
customer_reviews.text: While advertised as a 3 pack only a single bottle was shipped
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Finke

customer_reviews.title: Not too harsh
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and not too harsh, my skin feels nice and exfoliated and does not dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great for body acne
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fresh scent. Definitely helps reduce body acne. I only ever buy this body wash
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Smell good!
customer_reviews.text: Buy the three packs bundle and just finish the first bottle. Overall everything is nice, I love the smell and I could say it did help my skin a little.
customer_reviews.author: ChocoMei

customer_reviews.title: Didn't match purchase description
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a pack of 3, only one body wash was delivered so I paid almost $18 for one bottle. Complete waste of money. Regret paying for this and only receiving one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Azhanae

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product for the price. Its not very moisturizing but it doesn't leave my skin dry.

customer_reviews.title: Cleared my skin of bumps
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product. It helped me and my sister clear our skin of the bumps we had.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I love it but it does not get rid of all of my body acne. Am looking for another one that is better.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Have to use daily
customer_reviews.text: Price is the same as going to another retailer. You’re just able to order online and ship to your house. Product is great. Used it for two weeks and starting to see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: 3 teenagers
customer_reviews.text: Would like a larger bottle in a 3 pack, but not a bad price for the amount
customer_reviews.author: Chris Russell

customer_reviews.title: Sort of a funky smell..
customer_reviews.text: I mean...this bodywash is fine. It's very thick and has nice little scrubby things in it..That being said, the combination of the grapefruit scent (which is sort of odd and artificial) mixed with washing a healthy, 20 something nether region (if you know what i mean) is just very bizarre. It actually makes a really funky smell when i'm washing myself down-there to be perfectly honest and I've never had any sort of problems. I'm slightly hyper-aware of scents, but this is just the oddest thing I've ever experienced. I don't really know where I stand on this product based on that alone. I don't think I'll be buying this ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey McMombie

customer_reviews.title: Shipped only one pack instead of 3 pack

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love that I get three bottles. I love that its working already only used it a few times and smells amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Saving My Kiddo’s Skin, 1 Shower at a Time!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic value! We normally pay about $8/bottle and this was 3 bottles for just over $20. My child has Keratosis Pilaris and this is the best shower gel we’ve found to treat it.

customer_reviews.title: Second time and still only one bottle
customer_reviews.text: Second try of getting order and only received one instead of three in description. Frustrating.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price, thanks amazon:)!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says, after day 2 already see results and skin is soft & moist, thank you!!

customer_reviews.text: Only received one item—this is supposed to be a 3 pack. Please send me the other 2.

customer_reviews.title: This is only one not 3.
customer_reviews.text: Each time I get this I need a replacement order created because only one out of three actually come in the package.

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice thats about it.
customer_reviews.text: Used all three bottles over a 3 month period once a day and saw no improvement for my acne on my back and chest, made me smell nice but that was about it.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and worth the subscription
customer_reviews.text: Great product makes my skin soft and scent is lovely.

customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles was leaking and it covered all the bottles in the wash. Was about half empty.

customer_reviews.text: I only received 1 bottle instead of the 3 pack, which seems to be a common issue.

customer_reviews.text: I love the product but I ordered 3 bottles and one bottle was half empty.

customer_reviews.title: Missing my order
customer_reviews.text: Only received one of the three that were supposed to be included.

customer_reviews.text: You only receive 1 out of 1 of these products for this price.

customer_reviews.text: I only received one when the description said 3 pack

customer_reviews.title: Good for people who have acne on the body
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! The scent is refreshing and I love that it has BHA content to help my acne prone body

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy this at Target as individuals. This is a great deal for a 3 pack.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Drying!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this to help with Keratosis Pilaris. I can't really report on whether it has helped that or not yet, as it is too soon to tell I think. I will say that this wash is extremely drying and seems to be making my skin look worse. It makes my skin look very aged, wrinkly and splotchy. It may be too strong for my age. I have also been using AmLactin and Coconut Oil. I feel those are helping maybe. Too soon to tell, but I think they are helping.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not sure but think this made me breakout more, stopped using it jic
customer_reviews.author: Krista Diment

customer_reviews.title: Product that works
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years. It works amazingly to clear up acne on the body, especially for the back. The grapefruit scent is wonderful to smell as you shower and get ready for your day. If you don't have one, I definitely recommend a scrub brush to use with this product as well (don't scrub too hard!). Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: A&J

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I do have a moderate amount of acne on my body, and mostly I wanted this to target my back. So far I've noticed no difference in the severity, although it hasn't made the situation worse.
customer_reviews.author: Sahil

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the orange one but decided to give the grapefruit a try since it was a good deal for a pack of 3. So far, my skin has fewer breakouts. I can't use it on my face and neck without diluting it some because my skin is very sensitive. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria S

customer_reviews.title: Definitely smells better than the original scent
customer_reviews.text: Definitely smells better than the original scent, but still wish there were more options. For the environmentally minded, yes those are small plastic beads, great pacific garbage patch and all
customer_reviews.author: Doodly

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works!
customer_reviews.text: I take really good care of my skin, but have such a frustrating issue with pimples on my chest and a few randomly on my shoulders and back. It's completely cleared up and I've stopped developing new blemishes. I would definitely lather up and then let it sit for 30 seconds or so to let the salcylic do it's thing. Can't beat a solution that not only works but also is inexpensive!
customer_reviews.author: Barbina004

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Body Clear Body Wash with Salicylic Acid Acne Treatment to Prevent Breakouts, Pink Grapefruit Scent, 8.5 fl. oz (3 Pack)
product_meta.description:
Clear up acne body breakouts as you cleanse with Neutrogena Body Clear Pink Grapefruit Body Wash. Designed for acne-prone skin, this refreshing citrus body wash fights acne and breakouts on your back, chest, and shoulders. Its effective formula contains salicylic acid which treats and helps prevent breakouts without over-drying skin. With Micro Clear technology, this body wash works to cut through oil, allowing the acne treatment to penetrate to the source of acne and breakouts, unclogging congested pores while removing dirt and impurities. From the #1 dermatologist-recommended acne brand, our bubbly, lathering body wash contains naturally-derived grapefruit extract plus vitamin C antioxidant to treat the skin without sacrificing your shower experience and rinses clean without any pore-clogging residue. Treat and prevent body acne with Neutrogena Body Clear Pink Grapefruit Body Wash, comparable to Mountain Falls and AcneFree body wash.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Neutrogena Body Clear Body Wash Pink Grapefruit is a refreshing, clean-rinsing body wash that treats and helps prevent body breakouts with an uplifting blast of pink grapefruit. This unique formula features the maximum strength dermatologist recommended acne medicine Salicylic Acid boosted by oil-blasting MicroClear technology. It's specially developed to treat body breakouts such as those on your back, shoulders and chest without over-drying. The bubbly lathering formula contains 100% naturally derived grapefruit extract plus vitamin C and treats skin without sacrificing your shower experience. Salicylic Acid MicroClear ; Oil-free Non-comedogenic (won't clog pores)
feature_bullets: 8.5-fluid ounces of Neutrogena Body Clear Pink Grapefruit Acne Body Wash with salicylic acid acne medication specially designed for acne-prone skin to help treat and prevent acne breakouts

This refreshing body wash fights acne & breakouts on your back, chest and shoulders with Micro Clear technology that works to cut through oil, allowing acne medicine to penetrate to the source of acne & breakouts
The effective acne-fighting formula contains salicylic acid and a naturally-derived grapefruit extract along with Vitamin C antioxidant

Our lathering acne body wash unclogs congested pores while removing dirt and impurities, and rinses clean without leaving behind a pore-clogging residue for skin that feels clean and refreshed. Paraben free

Help fight acne and prevent breakouts without over-drying your skin with this refreshing citrus acne body wash from the #1 dermatologist recommended acne brand. Consider this product if you've liked body washes from Mountain Falls and AcneFree
